properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) The name of the Android instance.

properties.name: recipe_uuid
properties.description: (Required) Recipe UUID is the identifier used when starting an instance. It can be retrieved using gmsaas recipes list

properties.name: adbconnect
properties.description: (Optional) If is true, it will connect the instance to ADB. Defaults to "true".

properties.name: adb_serial_port
properties.description: (Optional) If the --adb_serial_port option is set, the instance will be connected to ADB on localhost:.
